name: stylelint-bundle
description: Create & provide a bundled version of Stylelint

scripts.cleanbuild: rm -rf node_modules/stylelint && npm run updater && npm install stylelint && npm run build-noupdate
scripts.build: npm run updater && npm run build-noupdate
scripts.build-noupdate: node build/index.js && npm run bundle && node build/post-build.js && npm run uglify && npm run test
scripts.uglify: npm run uglifybundle && npm run uglifyworker
